= Getting Started =

= Details =

Export HelloService and visit it in two styles, invoke all of them in two steps  :

1. coding style
   
   Run org.springframework.remoting.mina.gettingstarted.coding.HelloServiceExporter
   Run org.springframework.remoting.mina.gettingstarted.coding.HelloServiceClientTest

2. spring configuration style
   Run org.springframework.remoting.mina.gettingstarted.config.SpringHelloServiceExporter
   Run org.springframework.remoting.mina.gettingstarted.config.SpringHelloServiceClientTest
